alert.note: Alert for Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 29 at 4:12AM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches across the lower elevations of Baker County, 6 to 10 inches across the Upper Weiser River, and 12 to 24 inches across the West Central Mountains. Locally up to 30 inches over the mountains possible. * WHERE...In Idaho, West Central Mountains and Upper Weiser River zones. In Oregon, Baker County zone. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
